descriptions: Electronic storage and management system for recipes
Built for anyone, the user can navigate through their recipes in a list, view individual recipes, and edit their recipes
Anyone can register for an account and will receive a welcome email upon doing so

lemonProp.tagline: Property management portal for tenants and managers alike
descriptions: Property management website for making payments and submitting maintenance requests as a tenant
Utilized for tracking tenant activity as a manager
Conditional rendering determines what gets displayed and is dependent upon whether the user is a tenant or manager
Simple data display for ease of use

bcmPortfolio.tagline: Your source for all things Brooke Miller
descriptions: Portfolio website built from the ground up with an emphasis on design and no template
Built with Tailwindcss for easy theme toggling
Continued education of new features while building
Complete refactor and design from v1 to v2
Inventory system designed for boat and vehicle dealerships and manufacturers
Inventory items are added either manually or via an XML feed from various integrations
Items that are added or updated get pushed directly to the clients' sites in real time
Built with Vue, my contributions were to the front end and user experience

about: After moving to Colorado and working in a tax debt resolution firm for three years, I decided that I needed more. I had a job, but I wanted a career. Computer programming immediately came to mind.

When the world went into quarantine and commuting was removed from my schedule, I took advantage of the time I gained by taking an online coding class. A little taste was all it took for me to fall in love. I enrolled in DevMountain’s Web Development program, where I built foundations in coding logic, multiple languages, and full-stack web development.

That education prepared me for my first job as a software engineer, where I began my career in the industry that is right for me. My current position has allowed me to continue growing as a web developer by providing me with challenges to tackle and dedicated time to add to my stack. Now, with real-world experience under my belt, I’m ready to take the next step in my career.
